mapper.select: select CN , BIRTHDAY , BIRTHSIGN , BRN , CDMA2KIND , CONNCIDNAME , CONTRACTNUM , CUSTOMERID , CUSTOMERT , DISPLAYNAME , GENDER , HOMEADDRESS , HOMEADDRESS2 , HOMEPHONE , HOMEPOSTCODE , LASTLOGIN , MOBILE , MODELNAME , MRECEIVER , NICKNAME , NOMINATORID , OTHERM , PWDANSWER , PWDHINT , REALNAMECHOICE , RECEIVER , REGDATE , REGIP , SVCOFF , SPAMRECEIVER , UPDATETIME , WEDDING , PWDRESETTIME , LASTLOGINSITE , PWDUPDATETIME , COM_IMSINUM , COM_REGCHK , TEMPID , AGM4 , AGM4_DATE , AGM5 , AGM5_DATE , AGM3 , AGM3_DATE , ENCRRN , ENCCHK , RRN7 , CI , DI , JOINCHK , QOOKID , COCHK , CIVERSION , IPIN , ENCNCID , ENCCONNCID , ENCUSERPWD , FAILCHECK , FAILCHECK_DATE , KPM , SoIPSAID , SoIPCUST , SoIPBRN , OLLEHAGM , OLLEHAGMDATE , SoIPPHONE , SoIPCUSTID , MREGCHK , AGM6 , AGM6_DATE , PRV_CDMA2KIND , PRV_CONTRACTNUM , PRV_CUSTOMERID , PRV_CUSTOMERT , PRV_MOBILE , PRV_MODELNAME , PRV_SVCOFF , PRV_ENCNCID , PRV_BRN , ACT_SEQ , ACT_CODE , ACT_DATE , PROC_RSLT , PROV_DATE from PORTALUSER where 1=1 and UPPER(CN) = UPPER(#{pCn}) and RRN7 = #{pRrn7} and substring(replace(REGDATE,'-',''),1,8) = #{pDate} and BIRTHDAY >= convert(varchar(8),DATEADD ( mm , -168, getdate() ), 112)

select CN , BIRTHDAY , BIRTHSIGN , BRN , CDMA2KIND , CONNCIDNAME , CONTRACTNUM , CUSTOMERID , CUSTOMERT , DISPLAYNAME , GENDER , HOMEADDRESS , HOMEADDRESS2 , HOMEPHONE , HOMEPOSTCODE , LASTLOGIN , MOBILE , MODELNAME , MRECEIVER , NICKNAME , NOMINATORID , OTHERM , PWDANSWER , PWDHINT , REALNAMECHOICE , RECEIVER , REGDATE , REGIP , SVCOFF , SPAMRECEIVER , UPDATETIME , WEDDING , PWDRESETTIME , LASTLOGINSITE , PWDUPDATETIME , COM_IMSINUM , COM_REGCHK , TEMPID , AGM4 , AGM4_DATE , AGM5 , AGM5_DATE , AGM3 , AGM3_DATE , ENCRRN , ENCCHK , RRN7 , CI , DI , JOINCHK , QOOKID , COCHK , CIVERSION , IPIN , ENCNCID , ENCCONNCID , ENCUSERPWD , FAILCHECK , FAILCHECK_DATE , KPM , SoIPSAID , SoIPCUST , SoIPBRN , OLLEHAGM , OLLEHAGMDATE , SoIPPHONE , SoIPCUSTID , MREGCHK , AGM6 , AGM6_DATE , PRV_CDMA2KIND , PRV_CONTRACTNUM , PRV_CUSTOMERID , PRV_CUSTOMERT , PRV_MOBILE , PRV_MODELNAME , PRV_SVCOFF , PRV_ENCNCID , PRV_BRN , ACT_SEQ , ACT_CODE , ACT_DATE , PROC_RSLT , PROV_DATE from PORTALUSER where UPPER(CN) = UPPER(#{cn})
mapper.delete: delete from PORTALUSER where UPPER(CN) = UPPER(#{cn})
mapper.select: select count(*) as CNT from PORTALUSER where 1=1 and BIRTHDAY >= convert(varchar(8),DATEADD ( mm , -168, getdate() ), 112)
